data.title: Stars and Planetary Systems in Fiction
data.meta_description: Stars_and_planetary_systems_in_fiction - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides an overview of planetary systems of stars other than our Sun that are often featured in works of science fiction. It discusses the history of depicting exoplanetary systems in literature dating back to the 16th century. It also lists numerous real star systems that have been used as settings for science fiction stories, films, games, and novels. Many of these works fall into the genre of "planetary romances" where the plot is focused on the nature and characteristics of the exoplanet worlds.
